meanings.definition: A disease affecting horses, characterized by a slow, shuffling gait.
meanings.sent1: The vet diagnosed the horse with jogtrots.
meanings.sent2: The jogtrots made it difficult for the horse to keep up with the others.
meanings.sent3: The horse with jogtrots tried to dance, but its moves were more like a slow waltz.
meanings.sent4: The jogtrots clung to the horse like a heavy cloak, slowing its every step.
meanings.sent5: The jogtrots turned the once graceful horse into a plodding creature.

meanings.definition: To move at a slow, shuffling pace.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa jogtrots around the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: The tired dog jogtrots back to its owner after a long day of play.
meanings.sent3: The snail jogtrots along the garden path, taking its time to smell the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The old car jogtrots down the road, barely keeping up with the traffic.
meanings.sent5: The toddler jogtrots happily after the colorful butterfly, giggling all the way.
